com.jfoenix.controls

Class JFXAlert<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Dialog<R>
      • com.jfoenix.controls.JFXAlert<R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class JFXAlert<R>
extends javafx.scene.control.Dialog<R>
    JFXAlert is similar to JFXDialog control, however it extends JavaFX Dialog control, thus it support modality options and doesn't require a parent to be specified unlike JFXDialog
    Since:
    2017-05-26

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<JFXAlertAnimation> animation
      specify the animation when showing / hiding the dialog by default it's set to JFXAlertAnimation.CENTER_ANIMATION
      javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty hideOnEscape 
      javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty overlayClose
      indicates whether the dialog will close when clicking on the overlay or not
